attributes.additional_details:
It has been closed almost two years now by its authority and again they planned to shut it few more years. We believe it’s absolutely unfair for Admiralty Pier and Locals & Foreign Visitors, Local Businesses And 1000s of Anglers. 
Its a great pride and part of our heritage and culture. We are connected with it in so many ways Our forefathers to our childhood for all age group lots of happy memories are still alive with it. 
Please give us our Admiralty back, please reopen it for a greater good.
attributes.background:
Reopen The Admiralty Pier, Dover.

We have to recognise the fact that Admiralty Pier is a pride of Great Britain and our 1000s of Anglers, locals and visitors with lots of emotions, memories and history.
Government should do everything whatever it takes to save it and open it for public as usual.
